amendment.description: To provide additional funding for the project for Passaic River Steambank Restoration, Minish Park, New Jersey, with an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1718 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1718 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Corzine. (consideration: CR S11539-11544; text: CR S11542) To provide additional funding for the project for Passaic River Steambank Restoration, Minish Park, New Jersey, with an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1718 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1718 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Corzine.
